2778.verse: أَلَمْ تَكُنْ|"Were not|92|100|12378$ءَايَـٰتِى|My Verses|88|104|6043$تُتْلَىٰ|recited|66|82|3123$عَلَيْكُمْ|to you,|76|92|416$فَكُنتُم|and you used (to)|140|156|12329$بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ|deny them?"|125|133|12379$

2779.verse: قَالُواْ|They (will) say,|123|134|101$رَبَّنَا|"Our Lord!|86|109|1167$غَلَبَتْ|Overcame|86|109|2221$عَلَيْنَا|[on] us|68|91|681$شِقْوَتُنَا|our wretchedness,|143|166|12380$وَكُنَّا|and we were|105|116|6992$قَوْمًا|a people|76|328|3073$ضَآلِّينَ|astray.|86|338|12381$

2780.verse: رَبَّنَآ|Our Lord!|81|101|1167$أَخْرِجْنَا|Bring us out|99|140|4196$مِنْهَا|from it,|68|109|246$فَإِنْ|then if|63|104|227$عُدْنَا|we return|84|125|6605$فَإِنَّا|then indeed, we|127|147|4856$ظَـٰلِمُونَ|(would be) wrongdoers."|182|182|505$

2781.verse: قَالَ|He (will) say,|107|126|309$ٱخْسَــُٔواْ|"Remain despised|133|172|12382$فِيهَا|in it|54|93|253$وَلَا|and (do) not|104|143|25$تُكَلِّمُونِ|speak to Me."|111|130|12383$

2782.verse: إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed,|70|84|396$كَانَ|(there) was|98|126|913$فَرِيقٌ|a party|72|100|729$مِّنْ|of|50|78|53$عِبَادِى|My slaves|85|113|1611$يَقُولُونَ|(who) said,|95|123|753$رَبَّنَآ|"Our Lord!|86|100|1167$ءَامَنَّا|We believe,|97|114|78$فَٱغْفِرْ|so forgive|85|119|2689$لَنَا|us|42|76|338$وَٱرْحَمْنَا|and have mercy on us,|172|206|2605$وَأَنتَ|and You|74|108|5375$خَيْرُ|(are) best|87|104|2918$ٱلرَّٲحِمِينَ|(of) those who show mercy."|213|213|6874$

2783.verse: فَٱتَّخَذْتُمُوهُمْ|But you took them|143|157|12384$سِخْرِيًّا|(in) mockery|103|132|12385$حَتَّىٰٓ|until|64|92|526$أَنسَوْكُمْ|they made you forget|164|192|12386$ذِكْرِى|My remembrance,|137|151|11039$وَكُنتُم|and you used (to)|140|224|290$مِّنْهُمْ|at them|72|240|730$تَضْحَكُونَ|laugh.|116|200|12387$

2784.verse: إِنِّى|Indeed, I|80|89|312$جَزَيْتُهُمُ|have rewarded them|156|175|12388$ٱلْيَوْمَ|this Day|74|93|2217$بِمَا|because|75|94|43$صَبَرُوٓاْ|they were patient,|144|163|6772$أَنَّهُمْ|indeed, they|103|112|461$هُمُ|[they]|62|266|56$ٱلْفَآئِزُونَ|(are) the successful ones.|195|399|7477$

2788.verse: أَفَحَسِبْتُمْ|Then did you think|143|153|12390$أَنَّمَا|that|55|74|3535$خَلَقْنَـٰكُمْ|We created you|126|146|5846$عَبَثًا|uselessly|79|98|12391$وَأَنَّكُمْ|and that you|106|126|12392$إِلَيْنَا|to Us|57|76|1234$لَا|not|42|52|30$تُرْجَعُونَ|will be returned?"|134|134|297$

2791.verse: وَقُل|And say,|78|96|2709$رَّبِّ|"My Lord!|82|118|7$ٱغْفِرْ|Forgive|68|104|3353$وَٱرْحَمْ|and have mercy,|131|167|12396$وَأَنتَ|and You|74|110|5375$خَيْرُ|(are the) Best|114|132|2918$ٱلرَّٲحِمِينَ|(of) those who show mercy."|213|213|6874$

2778.verse: [It will be said]. "Were not My verses recited to you and you used to deny them?"

2779.verse: They will say, "Our Lord, our wretchedness overcame us, and we were a people astray.

2780.verse: Our Lord, remove us from it, and if we were to return [to evil], we would indeed be wrongdoers."

2781.verse: He will say, "Remain despised therein and do not speak to Me.

2782.verse: Indeed, there was a party of My servants who said, 'Our Lord, we have believed, so forgive us and have mercy upon us, and You are the best of the merciful.'

2783.verse: But you took them in mockery to the point that they made you forget My remembrance, and you used to laugh at them.

2784.verse: Indeed, I have rewarded them this Day for their patient endurance - that they are the attainers [of success]."

2785.verse: [Allah] will say, "How long did you remain on earth in number of years?"

2786.verse: They will say, "We remained a day or part of a day; ask those who enumerate."

2787.verse: He will say, "You stayed not but a little - if only you had known.

2788.verse: Then did you think that We created you uselessly and that to Us you would not be returned?"

2789.verse: So exalted is Allah, the Sovereign, the Truth; there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Noble Throne.

2790.verse: And whoever invokes besides Allah another deity for which he has no proof - then his account is only with his Lord. Indeed, the disbelievers will not succeed.

2791.verse: And, [O Muhammad], say, "My Lord, forgive and have mercy, and You are the best of the merciful."
